comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Fixed in revision 658575.

PS. Should we be using "200x-2008" instead of just "2008"?

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Updated the copyright lines in both READMEs and NOTICEs to contain the year of first publication and of any substantial modifications. See [1] for details.

[1] http://www.law.cornell.edu/uscode/html/uscode17/usc_sec_17_00000401----000-.html

description:
The README.txt files of Jackrabbit components contain copyright lines like this:

    Collective work: Copyright 2007 The Apache Software Foundation.

The year should be updated.
summary: Update copyright years in READMEs and NOTICEs
